gist.headline: Channel Surfing
gist.blurb: Postsiva joins the ecosystem! A new tool for YouTube creators to manage and optimize their channels is now in the showcase.
gist.summary: Added Postsiva, a SaaS platform for YouTube channel management and optimization, to the community apps list.
gist.impact: Creators looking for channel optimization tools can now discover Postsiva through our community showcase.
gist.visual_concept: Polly the bee as a content creator. She's in a cozy studio setup with a retro monitor showing video analytics (bar charts) and a pixelated 'Play' button. The vibe is 'streamer setup' but lo-fi and cozy.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot wearing a tiny headset, sitting at a creator's desk. A retro monitor displays a pixelated 'Play' button and rising graph lines. Lime green (#ecf874) and soft peach gradient background. Chunky pixels, warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic like Stardew Valley. Text in pixel font: 'ON AIR'. Nostalgic but beautiful.
